titlStmt.titl: Religion of East Asian Societies Metadata File
Religion of East Asian Societies Metadata File

stdyInfo.abstract: Metadata for the Religion in East Asian Societies survey conducted by Pew Research Center in 2023

fileTxt.fileName: EA Religion Public Data - Pew Research Center (All Vars).sav

var.name: QRID
var.labl: QRID. Respondent ID (UNIQUE TO EACH RESPONDENT)

var.name: weight
var.labl: Final weight

var.name: SurveyPublic
var.labl: Survey Public ID

var.name: DEMONYM
var.labl: DEMONYM.

var.name: Q1
var.labl: Q1. Overall, are you satisfied, dissatisfied, or neither satisfied nor dissatisfied with the way things are going in [SURVEY PUBLIC] today?

var.name: Q2a
var.labl: Q2a. In a family, who should be primarily responsible for the following activities? a. Earning money

var.name: Q2b
var.labl: Q2b. In a family, who should be primarily responsible for the following activities? b. Taking care of children

var.name: Q2c
var.labl: Q2c. In a family, who should be primarily responsible for the following activities? c. Making decisions about expenses

var.name: Q2d
var.labl: Q2d. In a family, who should be primarily responsible for the following activities? d. Taking care of aging family members

var.name: Q3
var.labl: Q3. Which of these statements comes closest to your opinion even if neither is exactly right?

catgry.labl: Women have an obligation to society to bear children
Women should decide for themselves whether or not to bear children

var.name: Q4
var.labl: Q4. Which of these three statements comes closest to your opinion?

catgry.labl: Men generally make better political leaders than women
Women generally make better political leaders than men
In general, women and men make equally good political leaders

var.name: QLEGAL
var.labl: QLEGAL. Do you strongly favor, somewhat favor, somewhat oppose or strongly oppose allowing gays and lesbians to marry legally?

var.name: Q5a
var.labl: Q5a. I'd like your opinion about some possible international concerns for [SURVEY PUBLIC]. Do you think that each of the following is a major threat, a minor threat, or not a threat to [SURVEY PUBLIC]? a. the United States' power and influence

var.name: Q5b
var.labl: Q5b. I'd like your opinion about some possible international concerns for [SURVEY PUBLIC]. Do you think that each of the following is a major threat, a minor threat, or not a threat to [SURVEY PUBLIC]? b. North Korea's nuclear weapons program

var.name: Q5c
var.labl: Q5c. I'd like your opinion about some possible international concerns for [SURVEY PUBLIC]. Do you think that each of the following is a major threat, a minor threat, or not a threat to [SURVEY PUBLIC]? c. Russia's power and influence

var.name: Q5d
var.labl: Q5d. I'd like your opinion about some possible international concerns for [SURVEY PUBLIC]. Do you think that each of the following is a major threat, a minor threat, or not a threat to [SURVEY PUBLIC]? d. China's power and influence

var.name: QCURREL
var.labl: QCURREL. What is your religion, if any?

var.name: Q6a
var.labl: Q6a. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? a. The Buddhist way of life

var.name: Q6b
var.labl: Q6b. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? b. The Christian way of life

var.name: Q6c
var.labl: Q6c. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? c. The Shinto way of life

var.name: Q6d
var.labl: Q6d. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? d. The Daoist way of life

var.name: Q6e
var.labl: Q6e. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? e. The Confucian way of life

var.name: Q6f
var.labl: Q6f. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? f. Local religions'/ Indigenous religions' way of life

var.name: QBORN
var.labl: QBORN. Would you describe yourself as a born-again or evangelical Christian?

var.name: Q7a
var.labl: Q7a. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits Buddhism, or not? a. Buddhism is a family tradition one must follow

var.name: Q7b
var.labl: Q7b. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits Buddhism, or not? b. Buddhism is an ethnicity one is born into

var.name: Q7c
var.labl: Q7c. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits Buddhism, or not? c. Buddhism is a culture one is part of

var.name: Q7d
var.labl: Q7d. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits Buddhism, or not? d. Buddhism is a set of ethical teachings to guide actions

var.name: Q7e
var.labl: Q7e. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits Buddhism, or not? e. Buddhism is a religion one chooses to follow

var.name: Q8a
var.labl: Q8a. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? a. do not respect elders

var.name: Q8b
var.labl: Q8b. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? b. do not respect [SURVEY PUBLIC]

var.name: Q8c
var.labl: Q8c. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? c. do not respect deities or spirits

var.name: Q8d
var.labl: Q8d. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? d. never go to temple or pagoda

var.name: Q8e
var.labl: Q8e. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? e. do not pray

var.name: Q8f
var.labl: Q8f. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? f. drink alcohol

var.name: Q8g
var.labl: Q8g. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? g. celebrate the Christian festival of Christmas

var.name: Q8h
var.labl: Q8h. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? h. celebrate the Muslim festival of Eid

var.name: Q8i
var.labl: Q8i. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? i. make offerings to or worship ancestors

var.name: Q8j
var.labl: Q8j. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? j. do not believe in the afterlife

var.name: Q8k
var.labl: Q8k. In your opinion, can a person be truly Buddhist if they do each of the following things? k. do not have a Buddhist funeral

var.name: Q9
var.labl: Q9. How important is religion in your life, if at all?

var.name: Q10
var.labl: Q10. Do you believe in god, or not?

var.name: Q11
var.labl: Q11. Do you think that there are unseen beings in the world, like deities or spirits?

var.name: Q12
var.labl: Q12. Which statement comes closer to your view even if neither is exactly right?

catgry.labl: There is only ONE true religion

var.name: QCHREL
var.labl: QCHREL. Thinking about when you were a child, in what religion were you raised, if any?

var.name: Q13
var.labl: Q13. Do you think of yourself as primarily Taiwanese, primarily Chinese, or both Taiwanese and Chinese?

var.name: Q14
var.labl: Q14. Do you think of yourself as primarily a Hong Konger, primarily Chinese, or both a Hong Konger and Chinese?

catgry.labl: Both a Hong Konger and Chinese

var.name: Q15a
var.labl: Q15a. Thinking about your life overall, would you say you generally go to the following places, or not? a. Shrines

var.name: Q15b
var.labl: Q15b. Thinking about your life overall, would you say you generally go to the following places, or not? b. Temples or pagodas

var.name: Q15c
var.labl: Q15c. Thinking about your life overall, would you say you generally go to the following places, or not? c. Churches

var.name: Q15d
var.labl: Q15d.Thinking about your life overall, would you say you generally go to the following places, or not? d. Monasteries or places for meditation

var.name: QFIGURESa
var.labl: QFIGURESa. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? a. Confucius

var.name: QFIGURESb
var.labl: QFIGURESb. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? b. Buddha

var.name: QFIGURESc
var.labl: QFIGURESc. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? c. Mother Mary

var.name: QFIGURESd
var.labl: QFIGURESd. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? d. Guandi or Guangong

var.name: QFIGURESe
var.labl: QFIGURESe. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? e. Jesus Christ

var.name: QFIGURESf
var.labl: QFIGURESf. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? f. Guanyin, Guanyi Bodhisattva, or Bodhisattva Avalokiteshvara

var.name: QFIGURESg
var.labl: QFIGURESg. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? g. Mazu, Goddess of the Sea

var.name: QFIGURESh
var.labl: QFIGURESh. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? h. The Kami

var.name: QFIGURESi
var.labl: QFIGURESi. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? i. Dalai Lama

var.name: Q16_1
var.labl: Q16. [SELECT ALL] People have different ways of taking care of deceased family members. Which of the following practices does your family do? Cremate your deceased family members

var.name: Q16_2
var.labl: Q16. [SELECT ALL] People have different ways of taking care of deceased family members. Which of the following practices does your family do? Bury your deceased family members

var.name: Q16_3
var.labl: Q16. [SELECT ALL] People have different ways of taking care of deceased family members. Which of the following practices does your family do? [OR] Follow some other method

var.name: Q16_98
var.labl: Q16. [SELECT ALL] People have different ways of taking care of deceased family members. Which of the following practices does your family do? Don't know

var.name: Q16_99
var.labl: Q16. [SELECT ALL] People have different ways of taking care of deceased family members. Which of the following practices does your family do? Refused

var.name: Q17
var.labl: Q17. Does your family scatter the ashes of deceased family members OR do you keep them at a particular location, like someone's home, a temple or pagoda, or a gravesite?

catgry.labl: Keep them at a particular location

var.name: Q18
var.labl: Q18. If you were planning the funeral for a family member or a loved one, how important would it be for you to follow traditional funeral rites and rituals?

var.name: Q19
var.labl: Q19. Do you have a family gravesite where the ashes or remains of deceased family members reside?

var.name: Q20a
var.labl: Q20a. Do you or someone in your household pay money to maintain the family gravesite, or not?

var.name: Q20b
var.labl: Q20b. Do you or someone in your household look after the family gravesite by sweeping or cleaning it?

var.name: Q21
var.labl: Q21. How often do you visit the family gravesite, if at all?

var.name: Q22a
var.labl: Q22a. In the past 12 months, have you done each of the following activities or rituals to honor or take care of your ancestors, or not? a. Offered food, water or drinks

var.name: Q22b
var.labl: Q22b. In the past 12 months, have you done each of the following activities or rituals to honor or take care of your ancestors, or not? b. Offered flowers or lit candles

var.name: Q22c
var.labl: Q22c. In the past 12 months, have you done each of the following activities or rituals to honor or take care of your ancestors, or not? c. Burned incense

var.name: Q22d
var.labl: Q22d.In the past 12 months, have you done each of the following activities or rituals to honor or take care of your ancestors, or not? d. Offered money or other things they may need in the afterlife

var.name: Q23
var.labl: Q23. In the past 12 months, have you told your ancestors about events in your life?

var.name: Q24a
var.labl: Q24a. Have you ever felt that a spirit of an ancestor has done each of the following, or not? a. Helped you

var.name: Q24b
var.labl: Q24b. Have you ever felt that a spirit of an ancestor has done each of the following, or not? b. Punished you

var.name: Q24c
var.labl: Q24c. Have you ever felt that a spirit of an ancestor has done each of the following, or not? c. Come to visit you in a dream

var.name: Q24d
var.labl: Q24d. Have you ever felt that a spirit of an ancestor has done each of the following, or not? d. Come to be with you in any other form

var.name: Q25a
var.labl: Q25a. Do you think each of the following things have their own spirits, or not? a. Mountains, rivers or trees

var.name: Q25b
var.labl: Q25b. Do you think each of the following things have their own spirits, or not? b. Certain objects, like crystals, jewels or stones

var.name: Q25c
var.labl: Q25c. Do you think each of the following things have their own spirits, or not? c. Houses or other buildings

var.name: Q26a
var.labl: Q26a. Thinking about some different kinds of experiences, how often do you have the following experiences? a. Feeling a deep sense of wonder about the universe

var.name: Q26b
var.labl: Q26b. Thinking about some different kinds of experiences, how often do you have the following experiences? b. Thinking about the meaning and purpose of life

var.name: Q27a
var.labl: Q27a. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? a. Rebirth

var.name: Q27b
var.labl: Q27b. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? b. Fate

var.name: Q27c
var.labl: Q27c.Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? c. Karma

var.name: Q27d
var.labl: Q27d. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? d. Nirvana

var.name: Q27e
var.labl: Q27e. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? e. Angels or helpful deities

var.name: Q27f
var.labl: Q27f. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? f. Demons or evil deities

var.name: Q27g
var.labl: Q27g. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? g. Miracles

var.name: Q27h
var.labl: Q27h. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? h. Heaven

var.name: Q27i
var.labl: Q27i. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? i. Hell

var.name: Q28
var.labl: Q28. How often do you pray, if at all?

var.name: Q29
var.labl: Q29. Is there an altar in your home, or not?

var.name: Q30
var.labl: Q30. Do you think it is acceptable or unacceptable for a person to try to persuade others to join his or her religion?

var.name: Q31
var.labl: Q31. Do you ever practice meditation, or not?

var.name: Q33
var.labl: Q33. In the past 12 months, have you had your fortune told, or not?

var.name: Q35
var.labl: Q35. Which of these two statements is closest to your opinion even if neither is exactly right?

catgry.labl: [SURVEY PUBLIC] will be better off in the future if it sticks to its traditions and way of life
[SURVEY PUBLIC] will be better off in the future if it is open to changes regarding its traditions and way of life

var.name: Q36
var.labl: Q36. Which of these two statements is closest to your opinion even if neither is exactly right?

catgry.labl: People should be allowed to speak their opinions publicly even if they upset other people
Harmony with others is more important than the right to speak one's opinion

var.name: Q37
var.labl: Q37. Do you think people who disagree with our government's actions should or should not be able to publicly criticize the government?

catgry.labl: Yes, should be able to publicly criticize the government
No, should not be able to publicly criticize the government

var.name: Q38a
var.labl: Q38a. Should religious leaders do each of the following things, or not? a. Talk publicly about what politicans or political parties they support

var.name: Q38b
var.labl: Q38b. Should religious leaders do each of the following things, or not? b. Be politicians

var.name: Q38c
var.labl: Q38c. Should religious leaders do each of the following things, or not? c. Participate in political protests

var.name: Q39a
var.labl: Q39a. How well do the following statements describe your views? a. Religion helps society by giving people meaning and purpose in their lives

var.name: Q39b
var.labl: Q39b. How well do the following statements describe your views? b. Religion encourages superstition and illogical thinking in society

var.name: Q39c
var.labl: Q39c. How well do the following statements describe your views? c. Religion gives people guidance so that they do the right thing and treat other people well

var.name: Q39d
var.labl: Q39d. How well do the following statements describe your views? d. Religion encourages violent and extremist thinking among people

var.name: QABORT
var.labl: QABORT. Do you think having an abortion should be legal in all cases, legal in most cases, illegal in most cases, or illegal in all cases?

var.name: Q40a
var.labl: Q40a. Would the following political system be a very good, somewhat good, somewhat bad or very bad way of governing [SURVEY PUBLIC]? a. A system in which two or more political parties contest elections

var.name: Q40b
var.labl: Q40b. Would the following political system be a very good, somewhat good, somewhat bad or very bad way of governing [SURVEY PUBLIC]? b. A system in which elections are held with only one party participating

var.name: Q40c
var.labl: Q40c. Would the following political system be a very good, somewhat good, somewhat bad or very bad way of governing [SURVEY PUBLIC]? c. A system in which a strong leader can make decisions without interference from parliament or the courts

var.name: Q40d
var.labl: Q40d. Would the following political system be a very good, somewhat good, somewhat bad or very bad way of governing [SURVEY PUBLIC]? d. A system in which experts, not elected officials, make decisions according to what they think is best for [SURVEY PUBLIC

var.name: Q40e
var.labl: Q40e. Would the following political system be a very good, somewhat good, somewhat bad or very bad way of governing [SURVEY PUBLIC]? e. A system in which the military rules [SURVEY PUBLIC]

var.name: QEDUHKG
var.labl: QEDUHKG. What is the highest level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

catgry.labl: Upper secondary education (GCE O Level (Form 5), GCE A Level (Form 7 in old structure), DSE Level (Form 6 in new structu
Associate degree or equivalent vocational degree

var.name: QEDUJPN
var.labl: QEDUJPN. What is the highest level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

catgry.labl: Junior college (associate degree), special training college (diploma or advanced diploma)

var.name: QEDUKOR
var.labl: QEDUKOR. What is the highest level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

catgry.labl: Junior college, polytechnic college / associate's degree, college of taxation (2-3 years)
Bachelor's degree or Korean army (4-6 years)

catgry.labl: Lower secondary education (Lower secondary education certificate)
Upper secondary, general (Upper secondary education certificate)

var.name: CHURCHEDUa

var.name: CHURCHEDUb
var.labl: CHURCHEDUb. At any point during your education, did you attend a school associated with each of the following? b. A Buddhist organization
